name: Equalizer 3
body_text: Draw cards until you have the same number
of cards in your hand as that opponent.

image.svg: <g transform="translate(100 75) scale(0.531 0.425)" ><path d="M9 756l0 -262 828 0 0 262 -828 0zm0 -403l0 -263 828 0 0 263 -828 0z" fill="#ffffff" fill-opacity="50%"/></g><text x="50%" y="360" font-family="Roboto" text-anchor="middle"  font-size="300" font-weight="700" fill="#ffffff" xml:space="preserve">3</text>
